enriched_movies.title: Godzilla Minus One
enriched_movies.enriched_description: "Godzilla Minus One" is a gripping horror film on Netflix that plunges viewers into a post-war Japan, where the terrifying re-emergence of Godzilla threatens humanity's fragile recovery. With an IMDb score of 7.

enriched_movies.title: Train to Busan
enriched_movies.enriched_description: "Train to Busan" is a gripping horror film on Netflix that follows passengers on a train to Busan as they struggle to survive a sudden zombie outbreak. With an IMDb score of 7.

enriched_movies.title: The Wailing
enriched_movies.enriched_description: "The Wailing is a chilling horror film on Netflix that delves into a mysterious series of deaths in a small Korean village, leading a local policeman to confront a sinister force. With an IMDb score of 7.

script:
"Horror fans, brace yourselves! StreamGank's unearthed 3 tantalizing thrillers from 2016-2023, guaranteed to make your spine tingle! Among them is the bone-chilling, 'Godzilla Minus One' that rocked 2016 with a whopping 7.7 IMDb rating. This isn't just a collection, it's a ticket to the nerve-racking world of horror! Stay tuned, it’s time to face your fears!"

"Board the 'Train to Busan,' a 2016 thrill-ride that redefines the zombie genre! 7.6 on IMDb, it's a journey of fear, survival, and heart you won't forget!"

"Dive into the eerie unknown with The Wailing, a chilling 2016 horror film. With a 7.4 IMDb rating, it's a spine-tingling spectacle you can't afford to miss!"
